item.title: Bittorent sync for repository mirroring
item.description: Theron Conrey writes about using: BitTorrent Sync as Geo-Replication for Storage We got a chance to talk about this idea at Linuxcon. I'm not entirely convinced there aren't some problem edge cases with this solution, but I think it will be hard to tell as long as the BitTorrent sync library is proprietary. I did come up with a special case of Theron's idea that I believe could work well. The special case uses the optimization that the synchronization (or file transferring) is unidirectional.
